data.author: PNL Design

changelog.release_notes: Optimized for Pebble 2, added app glance with current timezone
DST is now configurable for each timezone separately.
Added Abu Dhabi timezone (GMT +4, no DST)
Fixed display of sunrise and sunset time for 12-hour clocks. (Thanks Julia for reporting!). World time remains 24-hour format disregarding the watch setting.
Changed code to work as both Watchapp and Watchface. Fixed AM/PM display.
Bugfix : Temperatures below zero were shown incorrect
Added sunrise and sunset. Removed overkill on colors.
Replaced Reykjavik with -2 zone Oscar (military time)
Improved readability on smallprint. Fixed date display on Pebble Round.
Some polishing, temperature in bigger font and dst indicator in larger font.
Major polishing. Added cache for weather in case location is temporary unavailable.
Initial release, not tested on Pebble Round hardware (round not yet available)

data.description:
The ultimate World time clock for Pebble Time, Pebble 2 and Pebble Round. Configurable for 35+ cities/time zones, including half-hour offset zones. 

Now supports 3 favorite time zones. Cycle through the 3 favorites with a flick of the wrist, no need to use the phone to switch between favorite timezones.

Other features:
Supports 12/24 hour local clock with A/P indicator.
Weather icon with temperature in C or F (local weather).  
Moon phase display. Battery icon.
Local sunrise and sunset time.
Days of week in English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Klingon.
A-Grade energy friendly (extremely low battery usage).
BT disconnect warning (temp goes red with optional vibration). 
Keeps track of DST and timezone date. 
DST on dual time can be set to Automatic (recommended), On or Off.

This watchface is also available as a Watch App. Even more information and completely configurable from your wrist! Now includes an on-board compass!

2 days free trial, price $2.99. This is a bundle offer. If you purchase this watchface you can download the watchapp (same name) for free!

latest_release.release_notes: Optimized for Pebble 2, added app glance with current timezone
